alert.note: Alert for Collin; Fannin; Hunt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 5:46PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hunt, northeastern Collin and southwestern Fannin Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 546 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Melissa, or 10 miles northeast of McKinney, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... McKinney, Anna, Princeton, Melissa, Farmersville, Van Alstyne, Leonard, Lowry Crossing, Celeste, Merit, Blue Ridge, New Hope, Weston, Westminster, Frognot, Clinton, Nobility, Altoga, Floyd and Lavon Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
